predicate.note: Frames file for 'protest' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, which really surprises me.

roleset.name: object to something

example.name: hey hey ho ho, we won't go
example.text: Assume a neighborhood demonstration *trace* to protest speeding on a certain road or a careless accident involving a police car.
example.arg: speeding on a certain road or a careless accident involving a police car

roleset.note: Arg1 will (almost?) always be an NP.

roleset.name: manner of speaking

example.name: utterance missing
example.text: Meanwhile, Secretary of State Baker said the U.S. protested to Moscow over shipments of East bloc arms to Salvadoran rebels from Managua.
example.arg: over shipments of East bloc arms to Salvadoran rebels from Managua

example.name: missing hearer
example.text: Fed officials may protest that this doesn't necessarily mean a fundamental change in their interest-rate policies.
example.arg: this doesn't necessarily mean a fundamental change in their interest-rate policies

roleset.note: Arg1 will (almost?) always be a S.
